molmodmt.minimum_distance¶

molmodmt.minimum_distance(item_1=None, selection_1='all', selection_groups_1=None, group_behavior_1=None, as_entity_1=True, frame_indices_1='all', item_2=None, selection_2=None, selection_groups_2=None, group_behavior_2=None, as_entity_2=True, frame_indices_2=None, pairs=False, pbc=False, parallel=False, engine='MolModMT', syntaxis='MDTraj')[source]¶
